# Cell Images Parasitized or Uninfected
Image classification using fastai.

Jaime Avendano  
7-29-2021
source.81ca4f13:
## Conclusion
We were able to achieve a 95% accuracy on this dataset, which was pretty balanced to begin with.  
Looking at the of the images which we misclassified, it highlights that some of the images might have been mislabeled. For example, are few labeled uninfected have some spots on these.
